author: Joe Brennan
title: Minister weighs in as insurers reject Covid-19 claims
description: Thousands of pubs, cafes, restaurants and leisure facilities have closed in recent weeks
content: Minister for Finance Paschal Donohoe has called on insurers not to reject businesses claims for loss of earnings if they were advised by the Government to shut up shop to contain the spread of Covid-19, amid widespread evidence that the industry is relying on… [+4730 chars]
